alert.note: Alert for Kaibab Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 13 at 1:38PM MST until January 15 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM SATURDAY TO 5 PM MST SUNDAY ABOVE 5500 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected above 5500 feet. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 15 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph Sunday morning. * WHERE...Areas above 5500 feet near Jacob Lake. * WHEN...From 5 PM Saturday to 5 PM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...After a lull in the snow Sunday night, another storm is forecast to bring additional snow Monday into Tuesday. Please watch for later statements and possible watches or warnings. Snow forecast from 5 PM Saturday to 5 PM Sunday: Jacob Lake 6 to 10 inches.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
